/** * Compares two numbers given some amount of allowed error. * * @param x the first number * @param y the second number * @param eps the amount of error to allow when checking for equality * @return
  • 0 if {@link #equals(double, double, double) equals(x, y, eps)}
    • *
  • < 0 if !{@link #equals(double, double, double) equals(x, y, eps)} && x < y
    • *
  • > 0 if !{@link #equals(double, double, double) equals(x, y, eps)} && x > y
*/
